Name: OpenVPN-Client
Overview: This OpenVPN container was designed to be started first to provide a connection to other containers (using '--net=container:OpenVPN-Client'), see the documentation for further help here: https://github.com/ich777/docker-openvpn-client

Data Path.Name: Data Path
Data Path.Description: Data Path for your 'vpn.ovpn' and your certificates or your 'vpn.auth'.

TUN device.Name: TUN device
TUN device.Description: TUN device that is needed to run the container.
